name: set_energy_plus_minimum_outdoor_air_flow_rate
display_name: Set Energy Plus Minimum Outdoor Air Flow Rate
name_xml: Set EnergyPlus Minimum Outdoor Air Flow Rate
modeler_description: Controller:OutdoorAir objects will have the "Minimum Outdoor Air Flow Rate" set to the requested SI value.
description: Set the Minimum Outdoor Air FLow Rate for all Controller:OutdoorAir objects in the model. Input values are in SI units.
